ARABIC: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and placed the moon as a light in them and made the sun a blazing lamp?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And has placed the moon therein, an illumination, and has placed the sun, a lighted lamp?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and has placed the moon in them as a light, and the sun as a radiant lamp?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and placed therein the moon as a light
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘And in them, has illuminated the moon, and made the sun a lamp?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And has made the moon a light therein, and made the sun a lamp
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And made the moon therein a light, and made the sun a lamp?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and set the moon therein for a light and the sun for a lamp?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And hath made the moon a light therein, and made the sun a lamp?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and made the moon therein a light, and made the sun a lamp,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And hath placed the moon therein for a light, and hath made the sun a lamp?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and has made therein the moon for a light and the sun for a lamp?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And made the moon a light in their midst, and made the sun as a (Glorious) Lamp?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And has made the moon a light therein, and made the sun a lamp?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: setting in them the moon as a light and the sun as a lantern?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And He set the moon in their midst for light, and He made the sun a lamp.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:16] and made the moon therein — that is to say, within their totality, [but] which is [effectively] true in the case of the heaven of this world — as a light and made the sun as a lamp?, as an illuminating lantern, more powerful than the light of the moon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And hath made the moon) along with them (a light therein) a shining light therein, (and made the sun a lamp) a radiance for the children of Adam?
